articles.title: Australian parents pay emotional tribute to surfers killed in Mexico - BBC.com
articles.description: "The world has become a darker place for us," say the Australian parents of brothers Callum and Jake.

articles.title: Sun fires massive solar flares directly at Earth; Australia, Japan and China witness radio blackouts - WION
articles.description: The Sun has released two powerful solar flares over the past one week, causing radio blackouts in some regions. A newly emerged sunspot region, named AR3663, is understood to be behind these solar flares, which were fired off within just six hours of each oth…
articles.content: The Sun has released two powerful solar flares over the past one week, causing radio blackouts in some regions. A newly emerged sunspot region, named AR3663, is understood to be behind these solar fl… [+2247 chars]
